title: Taco DB
shortDescription: Designed and implemented a mini relational database system from scratch in C++, including buffer manager, page layout, and file manager for disk-based storage. Built a B+-Tree indexing layer with bulk-load, point/range queries, and iterators over custom varlen data pages. Implemented core query operators (scan, selection, projection, aggregation, index scan, joins, external sort) using an iterator-based execution model. Tuned page layout, index fill factor, and join/sort pipelines to satisfy strict performance and memory constraints on TPC-Hâ€“style workloads under an automated test harness.
